Free text description of capture process: Semimanual browser-based extraction of Data Set IDs followed by automated downloading (bash-scripted wget commands)
Type(s) of content in package: National Snow & Ice Data Center - scientific data about the Earth's frozen regions. 1044 data sets available. Must log in (free registration) to be able to download.
recommended_approach:
Instructions for bulk downloads: register (free) and follow
https://nsidc.org/support/faq/what-options-are-available-bulk-downloading-data-https-earthdata-login-enabled
